title: World Panel Data: A Macroeconomic Data Visualization and Analysis Toolkit
text: WPD (World Panel Data) R package simplifies access visualization global economic social panel data major international organizations academic researchers. aims serve bridge publicly available datasets researchers, students, general public, making cross-country panel data easier work . package includes large database (approximately 50MB) world panel data loaded demand ‘wp_data’ function. Features include customizable time series plots, cross-sectional analysis tools, scatter plots trend analysis, bar charts comparative analysis, built-seasonal adjustment capabilities, support annual quarterly frequencies. package focuses macroeconomic indicators GDP, trade, prices, employment, financial balance--payments data across multiple countries regions.
